generatedTitle: Stacy Haiduk takes over as Kristen DiMera on "Days of Our Lives"

extractFactDictList.question: Who portrayed Kristen DiMera on 'Days of Our Lives'?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The character Kristen DiMera on 'Days of Our Lives' was portrayed by actress Stacy Haiduk in She took over the role from Eileen Davidson, who had previously played the character.
